page.title: 16THE REV. A.Q. MORTON 1
page.content: The Rev.A.Q.Morton,minister at Culross Abbey, has a very interesting hobby-Mr. Morton is an unusual kind of detective.He uses words and sentence formation to find information just as a conventional detective uses finger- prints.This unusual hobby is aided by the use of a computer-Mr.Morton is an expert in this field too.He became interested in computers in the late l94O's,but it was the late '5O's before he was granted permission to work on Britain's only computer in London University.One of his first discoveries was that the New Testament had been written on 5 different sizes of paper.He later found that Pliny(who lived in the 1st.Century A.D.)confirms this. Mr.Morton has since written 5 books on his subject.He has written 4 more in collaboration with others.
